_meta.purpose: R2 Safety Phase - Golden benchmark calculations for physics validation
_meta.validation_rule: Each benchmark has expected_result with ±tolerance. PASS if within bounds.

benchmarks.name: K-Cast Iron Turning - GG25 Gray Iron
H-Hardened Taylor CBN Tool Life - D2
Chip Thinning Compensation - Low ae Milling

max_stable_ap_mm._note: R2-MS3: Corrected from 8.5mm after fixing stability Re[G] formula (was ~500x too high due to wrong FRF minimum). b_lim_min=0.01mm for 10mm tool at 6:1 L/D with simplified alpha=0.5. At 15mm operating depth, chatter is correctly predicted.
